attributes.action: reject any part privatisation or minority stake sale of Royal Mail which could lead to loss of service, price hikes and would erode a much loved public service.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A petition to keep a much loved public service fully intergrated and wholly in the public sector.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "reject any part privatisation or minority stake sale of Royal Mail which could lead to loss of service, price hikes and would erode a much loved public service."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20387


Prime Minister's Office
